attributes.action: Not making maths at A-level mandatory
attributes.additional_details: Nit allow our prime minester to ruin the lives of children by making them take a subject that already stresses them out.
attributes.background: Maths is only needed in a few careers so by making everyone take further maths or maths A-level It wastes how much learning of other subjects and wastes that qualification if one decides they aren't going to need it.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep Maths and English A-Level non-compulsory and let us keep a choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629754

Cancel plans for "maths to 18": https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630846
